page.title: 09POPULATION STUDY OF TIMSBURY
page.content:
In our survey,most people lived in the village of Timsbury,except for one person who lived in a hamlet. The number of people living inside the houses of Timsbury was about four per house,except for a few people who had two, or more than four people, in their homes. Most of the people we interviewed had relatives in Timsbury,apart from a few.Only a few had relatives on a farm.A few had relatives on a Farmborough farm,and a few had relatives on a Timsbury farm. A few people had relatives in Tunley, Marksbury, Farmborough or Priston. Some had lots of'extended family' relatives living in one house.
{ By Rachel and Christine.
